chapter.title: Viewing detected issues and test results
chapter.para: After you launch a test from the Diagnostics tab, and the test completes, it appears in the list Tests and Actions Run at the right side of the Diagnostics tab area. This list is sorted by priority.
At the same time, the Detected issues zone displays additional information about the tests run or currently running.
To see more information on a test or action, you can:

click the Full Results link in the Detected Issues panel in the middle.
click the test entry in the Tests and Actions Runlist on the right.
Both actions result in opening the Account Activity tab, where the detailed results are available for closer inspection.
The Sessions zone on the left presents an history of the sessions for the current Subscriber.
